msg.msgText:
The values of configuration items of "LogAutoTransfer" composite object can be obtained using the "show" option of the "imaserver" command. The "LogAutoTransfer" composite object defines the settings that are used for automatic log transfers.
SYNTAX: imaserver show LogAutoTransfer help imaserver show LogAutoTransfer
EXAMPLE: imaserver show LogAutoTransfer
The following configuration items are returned: Destination The URL to connect to the FTP or SSH server, including protocol. Port The port to access the server. UserID The user ID to use to log in to the server. Enabled Whether automatic log transfers are enabled.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
